content: LOT 1: 2018 Moonbits 1k bits silver finish chips x5, loaded#T2971#T2972#T2973#T2974#T2975LOT 2: 2017 Satori 0.001BTC chips x5, loaded#037266#022779#022775#022774#022773LOT 3: Satori x5, redeemed*Will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-lot auctions:Per lot, place bids as follows: 1 @ xxBTC, 2 @ xxBTC, up to 5 @ xxBTC*Winners will select chip numbers in order of winSTARTING BID PER LOT PER COIN/CHIP: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN/CHIP: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 16th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: I haven't seen peeled Satoris ever! When I first saw that picture I was really confused for a second. Kind of sad looking, with the whole hologram missing. - Could be fun to make a "bastard"-chip out of it with a different holo on the back. *coug-nasty-5BTC-cas-cough*Lot 2: 3@ 0.002
